text:
Common Breaks His Silence on Angela Rye Break Up

The "Hunter Killer" star shared what he learned from the nearly yearlong relationship.
title: Common Breaks Silence on Angela Rye Break Up | Essence

meta_data.description: After splitting back in March, Common said he learned a lot from the nearly yearlong relationship with CNN commentator Angela Rye.
